alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Coastal Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued December 11 at 5:30AM EST until December 12 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Rough choppy surf and a southward flowing longshore current in the surf zone today. A low risk of dangerous rip currents exists, especially near piers and jetties. * WHERE...Coastal Volusia, Coastal Indian River, Coastal Saint Lucie, Coastal Martin, Mainland Northern Brevard, Northern Brevard Barrier Islands, Mainland Southern Brevard and Southern Brevard Barrier Islands Counties. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Breezy northwest winds will produce a moderate southward flowing longshore current today, which can push swimmers into deeper water unexpectedly, and make them more susceptible to dangerous rip currents.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Coastal Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
